data.text: @BlueInFlorida76 Hi there! The determining factors in when, where, and how often we fly are numerous and ever-evolving. These factors include but are not limited to: demand for the service, aircraft/crew availability, and airport/ATC scheduling. - C
@H17Kelly Hi there! Our records indicate that a member of our team was ultimately able to assist you in a DM. We are glad to see that your issue has been resolved. - C

Did someone say NEW ROUTES? 🙌🙌

Get ready, because we have six new nonstop routes set to take flight this summer and fall! Plus, for the first time ever, we're offering service at @PHXSkyHarbor! https://t.co/ceW9ntRDZm

@IsabelG80769369 Hi there! There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a representative over the phone, as we are receiving an extremely high number of calls, all at once, at this time. You're welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that our team can look into this with you. - C

@iAmDariusDenzel Due to the current circumstances, we continue to receive an unprecedented number of communications each day. We appreciate your patience and understanding as our agents handle these calls in the order they are received. You can also send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@ashishagarwal_ Our records indicate that one of our team members was able to assist you in a DM. 🙂 - C

@PissOffTrumpz If you are having trouble with our website, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to troubleshoot with you as best as we can. - C

@PissOffTrumpz Hi there! Please be aware that, barring special situations, you do not have to call in to our Customer Care Service Center to book reservations with us. We have a full self-service website available to our customers at: https://t.co/HH4XDGQ907 - C
@ShadandAlly Hi Allyson! Allegiant welcomes travelers with disabilities for transport. Learn more here: https://t.co/MM3eUozSmz - C

urls.title: Passengers with Special Needs | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Allegiant is committed to providing passengers with special needs safe and comfortable travel. Learn more about procedures and approved devices for special needs passengers.

data.text: @BrowningStephen We continually analyze market trends and base our schedules on a variety of different factors, including airport availability and the business demand of routes. Unfortunately, we have discontinued our route between TUL and BLI. - GM
@ChristianTallet Hi, Christian! Yes, members of the National Guard are able to participate in our Allegiant Honors program. For more information, please visit https://t.co/b0cZLqiLbp

urls.title: Military Discount | Allegiant Honors
urls.description: Free flight services and military discounts for active duty military, retired military veterans, military reserves and their families.

@pc911sandra Hi Sandra! We appreciate your patience as our agents work diligently to assist each caller in the order their call is received. If you have questions or concerns that you would like addressed, please feel welcome to send them to us in a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@FowlerMahogany Hi there! We are sorry to hear that you missed your flight. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@DaveyVishakha Hi there! If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@mari___lena If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@lucekel Hi Kelly! We're sorry to hear about this. Unfortunately, delays are a necessary evil in air travel and can occur with little notice. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@verrymaryy Hi Alexis! Please delete this Tweet and send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that we can troubleshoot with you. - C
@satanthaaa Hi Satantha! We are very sorry to hear this. If in need of assistance, feel free to send us a DM. A member of our team would be happy to review your flight details. -JH

@MsTaken99 Trip Flex allows you to avoid our normal change and cancellation fees. Any difference in airfare will apply when making changes. Learn more here: https://t.co/4piCTDHIII If you have further questions or concerns, you may send us a DM. - C

@CoachPugs426 Hi Warren! We are able to make a correction to the spelling of a name. However, Allegiant tickets are not transferable, and we are unable to transfer a reservation to another passenger. -JH
@pushytherapist Hey Lori! I'm so sorry to hear that. Please fill out the following lost and found form here: https://t.co/ilBb1hFJHw. -JH

data.text: @529tlg The determining factors in when, where, and how often we fly are numerous and ever-evolving. These factors include but are not limited to: demand for the service, aircraft/crew availability, and airport/ATC scheduling. If you have additional questions, please send us a DM. - C

@la_zchestnut Hi there! Our website is up and running as it should be, at this time. If you are experiencing issues on your end, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that we can troubleshoot with you. - C

@caliman2002 Thanks for reaching out with this question. All customers two years of age and older are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times while traveling. If you have additional questions, please send us a DM. -JH
@katydid324 Hi there! We see someone is responding to your DM now. We do work in the order received and appreciate your patience as we work diligently to assist all customers concerns. - GM
@KatieBowers1 Hey Katie! If in need of assistance, feel free to send us a DM. -JH
@KohlRobin We show you have sent us a DM for assistance. Thanks for reaching out. -JH
@katydid324 So glad you were assisted. Have a wonderful day! -JH
@katydid324 Again, we are very sorry for the wait as our team members work diligently to assist passengers as soon as possible. Regrettably, we were unable to locate a DM sent from you. -JH

@katydid324 We're sorry to hear of your frustration. We have agents staffed 24/7 and can be reached at 702-505-8888. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with an agent over the phone, as we continue to receive an unprecedented number of calls each day. You can also send us a DM. -J
@reneegarland That would be a wonderful route, thanks for the suggestion! -JH
@JulieLantz16 Hi Julie. Our truest apologies for any inconvenience or frustration. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

We’re movin’ on up!

#ICYMI We moved to the new West Gates in Terminal 1 at @flyLAXairport. This sets the stage for our next phase of growth in SoCal. Get ready for more capacity and even more affordable, nonstop flights! Learn more: https://t.co/aeVDzTK1aY

📸: @flyLAXairport https://t.co/TXSyOwRQUX

@j_smitty2008 Hey Justin. All routes are current up until mid-December 2021. Regrettably, we do not show service to/from BLV-MYR in September. For alternative routes, visit: https://t.co/kPsFDtYDcE. -JH

@esteleeslusser Hi there! A personal item cannot exceed the dimensions of 7x15x16 inches. A carry-on bag is not to exceed the dimensions of 9x14x22 inches. Should you have any other questions, feel free to send us a DM. -JH
@TaylorMorefiel1 We're sorry to learn you are having a hard time reaching us. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@AuntyTurnUp We see you sent a message and have been responded to. If you have any other questions, let us know. - GM
When it comes to hiring almost 200 pilots, we’ve officially been #ClearedForTakeoff. Apply to become one of the brand new additions to our roster at https://t.co/tlcz1QBJAf! https://t.co/QqdDQJLRYX
Ready. Set. Let's grow! 🥳 https://t.co/AksyofpaW7

@tcashballer21 Hi! If you booked on or before 04/30/2021, you must call in to our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888 to make changes. If your reservation was booked on or after 05/01/2021, we've made it easy for you to change your itinerary by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. - C

@Tee18512846 Hi Tee! We do not have "WiFi boosters" onboard our aircraft, as we do not offer WiFi on our flights. We apologize for any frustration you may be experiencing. If you have further questions or concerns, you are welcome to send us a DM. - C
